amendment.description: Amendment reduces by $2 million the appropriation for Court of Appeals and District Court's space alteration projects, and furniture and furnishing related to new space alteration and construction projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 7 in the Congressional Record of July 21, 1995, to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for Court of Appeals and District Courts' space alteration projects by $2 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Portman amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
